Lifelink

cards.flavor_text: [i]“Anyone who believes in a better world is welcome in Paxaeus.”[/i]

cards.rules_text: If you spent {U} to cast this spell, draw a card. If you spent {B} to cast this spell, you gain 3 life. If you spent {R} to cast this spell, put a +1/+1 counter and a first strike counter on target creature. If you spent {G} to cast this spell, create a token that's a copy of a creature you control with power 3 or less.

[i](Gain the next level as a sorcery to add its ability.)[/i]

{5}{W}: Level 3
Whenever three or more creatures you control attack, put a +1/+1 counter on each of those creatures.

cards.rules_text: Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn. Untap them.
cards.flavor_text: [i]There was something magical, Arthur thought, about seeing Paxaeus, Theorios, Nyxhau, Pyrinspir, and Veridance all fighting under the same banner.[/i]

• Target creature gets +0/+3 until end of turn.
